author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1626 Modified to catch and handle exception when trying to dispatch a message to client. If the send fails, the code logs a message at WARNING level and moves on.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1626 Modified to catch and handle RuntimeException when trying to dispatch a Throwable that is not serializable. The code converts the stack trace in a Throwable to string, wraps in UIMAEEServiceException and sends it out

author: jleroux
msg: Small cleanup in labels for categ content

author: jleroux
msg: Cleans labels, to be checked in Dutch
